attributes.action: Debate leaving the European Court of human rights
attributes.additional_details: Because the British people honestly believe that the government don't carry out its wishes
attributes.background: Debate leaving the European Court of human rights

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618456

If the above petition gets 100,000 signatures it will be considered for debate by the Petitions Committee.
